website_summaries.verdict: An innovative way to carry your drone on a backpack without getting delicate parts damaged.
pros: The drone mount is lightweight and durable
Easily secures to most common backpacks to provide a solid connection
cons: Backpack mount leaves the drone exposed to the elements or damage if the backpack falls

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The IFlight drone lock mount is very sturdy and made of Carbon and it only took me about 20 mins.to make the holes and screw down the mounts.Your able to turn any backpack into a drone back pack and allowing more space inside of your backpack.They send you 2 mounts along with the hardware and i don't have to worry about my quad getting crushed inside the backpack.It's also very sturdy so i recommend this lock mount.
customer_reviews.author: Tech5960

customer_reviews.title: Beats spending big $$$ for a quad bag
customer_reviews.text: I retrofitted a Dell backpack I was given for my work laptop. I added 2 sets of these to this backpack and not only does it look awesome but, the mounts are high quality. A cheap way of turning any bag into a quad travel bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Torres Laster

customer_reviews.title: Holds your Quads like a momma bear holds her cubs!
customer_reviews.text: What's safe, warm, comfortable and secure? Well, if your a bear cub, it's your momma's embrace. If you race or freestyle drones, it's these clips.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: 2 zip ties will work better, be stronger and cost less than 1.00
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Betker

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: No questions, worth every penny, very high quality product, easy to install to the backpack, I am using to carry 2 quads and a camera tripod on my backpack. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have had 0 problems with this product. Mine came with 4 straps 2 short and 2 long. The long is great for my 5 inch and the short snuggs up my 3 inch perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kwitoski

customer_reviews.title: Thick bags might cause problems
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my application. My iflight bag is a little thick, making this difficult to use. Once secure it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BigRawn

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: Only have had them for a month, used them twice.. Sooo fat, sooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Rigual

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Turn a cheap rugged hikers back pack into a drone back pack, Choices were pay for a over priced drone bag or get these and a great cheap rugged back pack or one that doesn’t advertise as a drone bag cause calling it that will raise the price
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to fly!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to attach. Awesome to have your rig ready when you get to your flying spot!
customer_reviews.author: LocoMatt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my backpack
customer_reviews.text: Holds my drone builds securely to my backpack and the mounts honestly make my backpack more versatile in other ways than just mounting my drones! But be sure to mount them higher up on your back pack so your quad doesn’t hit the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I bought. As the other reviews have stated the strap is too small so I buy a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work just like advertised. Easy and I got to keep my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O.

customer_reviews.title: Good mounts
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for my backpack. Just a little tough getting them placed and put together where I needed them on my backpack
customer_reviews.author: Kaje

customer_reviews.title: Main part works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for turning an old back pack into a drone bag. Just don't use the straps it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good price, easy to install and matches my inflight drone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a 5 inch quad perfect and the set up is easy
customer_reviews.text: Holds a 5 inch quad perfect and the set up is easy. I recommend to those who hate to part with their favorite bag and fly quads.
customer_reviews.author: DronedOut

product_meta.title: iFlight 2 Set FPV Drone Lock Mount for Backpack Plug-in Accessories DIY Bundle Mount Hanging Buckle with 2pcs Battery Straps 20X200mm for FPV Quadcopter
feature_bullets: FPV drone backpack plug-in accessories bundle mount hanging buckle
Use for mounting and hanging fpv drones on backpack,easy to install
Come with battery straps,20x200mm black to bundle up your FPV quadcopter drones
Carbon fiber plate,small size and lightweight,very durable
Makes your normal casual or business backpack to a super cool-looking racer carrier
